issue.title: Is there any updates of GetX ?
issue.body:
I really like GetX and do most projects with GetX CLI. I also send you email but not get any update on it 
From last One year of no updates and no communication from the developer @jasonlaw  can you Please update it ASAP or let me know when you will go for release 5.0.0?


Thank You

issue.title: Null safety with <Widget?>Obx function.
The value of Get.height, Get.width is not equal to MediaQuery.of(context).size.height, MediaQuery.of(context).size.width
issue.body:
The value of Get.height, Get.width is not equal to MediaQuery.of(context).size.height, MediaQuery.of(context).size.width

I encountered this problem while updating to version get: ^3.16.1

**Screenshots**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46576627/98853450-389eda00-246a-11eb-80e4-a9b046bf34bf.png)


**Flutter Version:**
Flutter (Channel stable, 1.22.2, on Microsoft Windows [version 10.0.19041.572], locale fr-FR)

**Getx Version:**
get: ^3.16.1

HUAWEI GRA UL00 (mobile) • X2P0215529020700 • android-arm64 • Android 6.0 (API 23)

issue.title: GetX 5
issue.body:
I think I have failed to be conservative.

GetX basically hasn't changed since its first version (only the RxTypes have changed due to Flutter updates), and I've been trying to keep breaks to a minimum for each update, after all, this is one of the things I like (or liked) the most in using a framework, not having to tinker with its code for a long time.

However, version 5 became a headache. We were migrating the api to navigator 2 completely without ANY break, this is insane. I had to keep a bunch of code I didn't want to maintain compatibility.

However, the truth is that Flutter has matured over the years, and so have I, and there are many things that I just don't see any sense in anymore.

GetWidget, for example, is a widget that prevented Flutter from updating a widget for performance. This was identical to React's PureComponent, not present in Flutter, however, it complicated the api, and brought more bugs than benefits, simply because it was impossible to modify it. With current applications that have dynamic themes, this has become useless.

Also, it seems that GetX users have come to demonize BuildContext, and well, that might have been my fault, after all, that was GetX's description. However, our role was to provide parallel dependency management approaches, not based on BuildContext, but that didn't mean we stopped using it. Today there are people who use Get.width within widgets, which is a headache, since it does not receive dynamic updates, for that there is context.width, however, despite this being in the documentation, this seems to be ignored by part of the users.

That way, I ended up pushing an update forward, just out of fear, fear of having to refactor my projects, fear of causing too many breakings, and the project went a long time without updates.

However, I think we can be better, I think we can have a solid, modern foundation (the current one was written 4 years ago), and so I think we're going to have some changes.

I created this issue to share all the changes I'm going to make in version 5, to serve as a guide in case something breaks.

This does NOT mean that GetX 5 will be full of breaking changes, just that it will have small breaking changes, like every major package update.

issue.title: Can't run project with get-5.0.0-release-candidate-5
issue.body:
**Describe the bug**
```
/C:/Users/tholq/AppData/Local/Pub/Cache/hosted/pub.dev/get-5.0.0-release-candidate-5/lib/get_state_manager/src/simple/get_controllers.dart:125:30: Error: Member not found: 'hidden'.
      case AppLifecycleState.hidden:
                             ^^^^^^
/C:/Users/tholq/AppData/Local/Pub/Cache/hosted/pub.dev/get-5.0.0-release-candidate-5/lib/get_navigation/src/routes/get_information_parser.dart:23:34: Error: The getter 'uri' isn't defined for the class 'RouteInformation'.
 - 'RouteInformation' is from 'package:flutter/src/widgets/router.dart' ('/C:/Users/tholq/fvm/versions/3.7.10/packages/flutter/lib/src/widgets/router.dart').
Try correcting the name to the name of an existing getter, or defining a getter or field named 'uri'.
    final uri = routeInformation.uri;
                                 ^^^
/C:/Users/tholq/AppData/Local/Pub/Cache/hosted/pub.dev/get-5.0.0-release-candidate-5/lib/get_navigation/src/routes/get_information_parser.dart:45:7: Error: No named parameter with the name 'uri'.
      uri: Uri.tryParse(configuration.pageSettings?.name ?? ''),
      ^^^
/C:/Users/tholq/fvm/versions/3.7.10/packages/flutter/lib/src/widgets/router.dart:45:9: Context: Found this candidate, but the arguments don't match.
  const RouteInformation({this.location, this.state});
        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
/C:/Users/tholq/AppData/Local/Pub/Cache/hosted/pub.dev/get-5.0.0-release-candidate-5/lib/get_utils/src/extensions/context_extensions.dart:5:41: Error: Member not found: 'MediaQuery.sizeOf'.
  Size get mediaQuerySize => MediaQuery.sizeOf(this);
                                        ^^^^^^
/C:/Users/tholq/AppData/Local/Pub/Cache/hosted/pub.dev/get-5.0.0-release-candidate-5/lib/get_utils/src/extensions/context_extensions.dart:69:50: Error: Member not found: 'MediaQuery.paddingOf'.
  EdgeInsets get mediaQueryPadding => MediaQuery.paddingOf(this);
                                                 ^^^^^^^^^
/C:/Users/tholq/AppData/Local/Pub/Cache/hosted/pub.dev/get-5.0.0-release-candidate-5/lib/get_utils/src/extensions/context_extensions.dart:75:54: Error: Member not found: 'MediaQuery.viewPaddingOf'.
  EdgeInsets get mediaQueryViewPadding => MediaQuery.viewPaddingOf(this);
                                                     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
/C:/Users/tholq/AppData/Local/Pub/Cache/hosted/pub.dev/get-5.0.0-release-candidate-5/lib/get_utils/src/extensions/context_extensions.dart:78:53: Error: Member not found: 'MediaQuery.viewInsetsOf'.
  EdgeInsets get mediaQueryViewInsets => MediaQuery.viewInsetsOf(this);
                                                    ^^^^^^^^^^^^
/C:/Users/tholq/AppData/Local/Pub/Cache/hosted/pub.dev/get-5.0.0-release-candidate-5/lib/get_utils/src/extensions/context_extensions.dart:81:45: Error: Member not found: 'MediaQuery.orientationOf'.
  Orientation get orientation => MediaQuery.orientationOf(this);
                                            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
/C:/Users/tholq/AppData/Local/Pub/Cache/hosted/pub.dev/get-5.0.0-release-candidate-5/lib/get_utils/src/extensions/context_extensions.dart:90:45: Error: Member not found: 'MediaQuery.devicePixelRatioOf'.
  double get devicePixelRatio => MediaQuery.devicePixelRatioOf(this);
                                            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Target kernel_snapshot failed: Exception
```

**Flutter Version:**
3.7.10

**Getx Version:**
5.0.0-release-candidate-5

comment.body: Use release candidate 4, or upgrade flutter.

pull_request.title: feat(lint): add flutter lint to examples
pull_request.body:
## Description

Add flutter_lints to examples

## Pre-launch Checklist

- [ ] I updated/added relevant documentation (doc comments with `///`).
- [ ] I added new tests to check the change I am making or feature I am adding, or @jonataslaw said the PR is test-exempt.
- [x] All existing and new tests are passing.
